    • Constructor Detail

      • DRulerModelImplem

        public DRulerModelImplem(DSequence seq,
                 int startPos,
                 int increment)
        Constructor. Given a DSequence, this implementation creates a continues ruler starting at statrPos and incremented by the value of increment. If DSequence contains gaps, then value -1 are attributed to them.
